title: Episode 271: Kitchens of the Great Midwest with J. Ryan Stradal
description: This week on Eat Your Words, host Cathy Erway welcomes author J. Ryan Stradal, whose first novel, Kitchens of the Great Midwest, was published by on July 28th, 2015, and reached the New York Times Hardcover Best Seller list at #19 on its third week of release. In April 2016, the American Booksellers Association named Kitchens the Indies Choice Book of the Year Award – Adult Debut Winner.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
